A RESTful API for accessing and managing U.S. state data, including fun facts.

ðŸ›  Technologies Used

  • Node.js / Express
  • TypeScript
  • MongoDB / Mongoose

ðŸ“š Endpoints

GET /states

Returns all U.S. state data, including fun facts.

Optional Query Parameters:

  • ?isContig=true â€” Only the 48 contiguous states.
  • ?isContig=false â€” Only Alaska and Hawaii.

GET /states/:state

Returns complete data for a single state. :state can be a 2-letter abbreviation.

GET /states/:state/:property

Returns a single property about the state.

Supported properties:

  • funfact â€” Returns a random fun fact.
  • capital
  • nickname
  • population
  • admission

POST /states/:state/funfact

Add one or more fun facts to a state.

Request Body:

{
  "funfacts": [
    "This is a state.",
    "This is a fact."
  ]
}

PATCH /states/:state/funfact

Update a specific fun fact for a state by its index.

Request Body:

{
  "index": 1,
  "funfact": "This is an updated fun fact."
}

DELETE /states/:state/funfact

Delete a specific fun fact by index.

Request Body:

{
  "index": 1
}
